full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG BDE DGA' DPAL 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED STONG 'KHOR MANYDZU SHR'I HU THUG THU RIN PO CHE'I ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES GANG GI DGON PA'I KHRI 'DZIN CHOS RJE BLA MA BLO BZANG 'OD ZER DANG, PHYAG MDZOD PAN SA NA WA CHIR DANG, GSOL DPON RDO RJE RGYA MTSO GSOL DPON BZOD PA SOGS BKA' 'BANGS ZHABS GRAS PA SER SKYA THUN MONG NAS MAndAL RTEN GSUM DANG BCAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^KHU RE YE CHEN MO'I MKHAN PO NO MON HANG YONGS 'DZIN ^GONG MA RGYAL PO'I BKAS LING SHING SHING THUNG AE RTE NI AO HAN BU PAndI TAR 'BOD PA ^SH'AKYA'I RING LUGS 'DZIN PA DGON GSAR SKYES MING PA DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS RAB GUS DVANGS PA CHEN POS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
